Turn left and walk through the living room. Exit the room, turn right and walk up the stairs. stop in th e middle of the stairs.

instructions: Turn around until you're facing the middle of three arches with a table surrounded by six chairs behind you. Walk through the middle arch until you see a long table with eight chairs on each side and a fireplace further down in the next room to your right. There will be a door leading to the outside on your left. Turn ninety degrees to the right and walk towards the fireplace with the long table towards your left, stopping just before reaching the carpet in front of the fireplace.
Facing the three archways go forward and immediately right, go through the rectangular archway and go into the first room on your left, go along the table, and stop at the chairs.
Leave the office heading to the dining room. Walk through the room and into the kitchen. Stop in the doorway to the sitting room.
